title: Spectating games crashing
body:
Anyone else having this issue since patch?
I did reports and posted to Help & Support.
Just wondering if it is just me or patch has conflict somewhere with spectating games.
During loading or few seconds into watching game the game crashes and a bug report notification comes up.

replies.body:
Hi

thanks for the report - we're taking a look now!

Cheers
Mindstar

Thank you Mindstar,
I'm still trying to spectate games, just crashes every time. 
It only started once i updated the client with new patch.

Hi

We've found the cause of the issue, and we're looking to roll out a hotfix for this.  It will likely happen later in the week, so keep an eye on the [server status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#oce) page for updates.

Cheers!
Mindstar
LATER IN THE WEEK?!!?? hooooooooooooooooow, just do it now!
